name: Anthony BURKE, by his Parent and Natural Guardian, John BURKE, Petitioner v. INDEPENDENCE BLUE CROSS, Respondent

parties: Anthony BURKE, by his Parent and Natural Guardian, John BURKE, Petitioner v. INDEPENDENCE BLUE CROSS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of July, 2013, the Petition for Alowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue is:
Did the Pennsylvania General Assembly intend to deprive families of children with autism of the right to appeal insurance denials to court[,] while granting that right to insurance companies?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
71 A.3d 249
Anthony BURKE, by his Parent and Natural Guardian, John BURKE, Petitioner v. INDEPENDENCE BLUE CROSS, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 11, 2013.
